title: Run nickel run: the making of a movie

description: Documents the making of the feature film "Nickel Queen". This Australian production directed by John McCallum and starring Googie Withers told the story of the widowed owner of the Mirribilli pub's sudden turn of fortune during the mining boom in Western Australia. Includes a scene with John Laws as a hippie.
